items.composition: Face: 100% Nylon/ Filling: Body: 90% Down, 10% Waterfowl Feathers/ Hood Edge: 100% Polyester/ Back: 100% Nylon/ Pocket Lining: 100% Polyester
items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
- Matte fabric gives it a sleek impression.
- Durable water-repellent coating for light rain. *A water-repellent coating is applied to the surface of the fabric for a longer-lasting water-repellent effect.THE FINISH IS NOT PERMANENT.
-750+ Fill Power* high quality down. *by IDFB Measurement method
-No down pack for Ultra Light Weight.
-Pocketable design. Including its own carrying bag.
- Anti-static lining.
- Updated cut with a more comfortable fit.
- Removable hood that stores inside the stand collar for a sharp look.
- Knee-length design for superb warmth.
items.name: ULTRA LIGHT DOWN LONG COAT
items.shortDescription: Updated fit for greater comfort. Super warm knee-length design. 750+ Fill Power* high quality down.
items.washingInformation: Hand wash cold, Do not dry clean

items.longDescription:
- Soft premium cotton-blend gabardine fabric.
- Durable water-repellent finish. * The finish is not permanent.
- The classic trench coat, updated with a shorter length and A-line cut.
- Versatile design easily styles up or down.
- Leave the buttons undone to create an elegant drape.
- Cinch up the waist belt for a different look.
items.name: SHORT TRENCH COAT
items.shortDescription: The old-fashioned trench coat, revamped for a look that works with styles from casual to refined.

- Durable water-repellent finish. * The finish is not permanent.

items.name: TRENCH COAT
items.shortDescription: The traditional trench coat, now in a roomier cut. Belt provides styling options.

items.composition: Body: 70% Cotton, 30% Nylon/ Belts: Outer Layer: 70% Cotton, 30% Nylon/ Belts: Inner Layer: 100% Polyester
items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.

- Lightweight cotton nylon fabric.
- Durable water-repellent finish. *The finish is not permanent.
- Removable hood.
- Tab at the collar for opening and closing.
- Belt lined with herringbone tape.
- With slits.
- The back widens under the gun flap for breathability and lightweight comfort.
items.name: UNIQLO U HOODED LONG COAT
items.shortDescription: Long hooded coat. An authentic piece with a focus on details and comfort.

- Fluffy windproof fleece fabric.
- In a slightly oversized cut that allows for layering.
- The generous length is just enough to cover the knees and create a cozy look.
- Goes with any outfit.
items.name: WINDPROOF FLEECE TAILORED COAT
items.shortDescription: A windproof film provides protection against the cold. A charming tailored coat made of fluffy fabric.
items.washingInformation: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle, Do not dry clean

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
- 3-layer Blocktech fabric with ripstop outer layer.
- Durable water-repellent coating for light rain. *A water-repellent coating is applied to the surface of the fabric for a longer-lasting water-repellent effect.THE FINISH IS NOT PERMANENT.
- Moisture-permeable, water-resistant, and windproof.
- Updated with a sophisticated flared cut that makes it easy to layer.
- Soft jersey interior for a smooth feel.
- With adjuster buttons at the cuffs to adjust the fit.
- Designed with gussets under the arms for ease of movement.
- Side slits allow easy movement even when riding a bike.
items.name: BLOCKTECH COAT
items.shortDescription: High-performance coat with an updated cut that is perfect for layering and everyday situations.
items.washingInformation: Hand wash cold, Do not dry clean

items.longDescription:
- Fleece outerwear with windproof technology.
- A mid-length coat with a soutien collar and buttoned design that creates a casual yet modern feel.
- Stylish cocoon silhouette for easy layering.
- There may be variations in the appearance of the fleece due to the nature of the fabric and sewing process. These variations are managed by our strict production controls.
items.name: WINDPROOF OUTER SINGLE BREASTED FLEECE COAT
items.shortDescription: Based on customer feedback, our popular Mens windproof fleece is now also available in our Womens lineup. It is lightweight, soft, windproof, and keeps you warm.
